skillTree.localised_description: The Wizard moves with the flow of aethyric energies, slipping through blows as dust and unseen currents swirl in their wake.

effects.description: Transformation "Desert Winds"

skillTree.localised_description: This one ensures that those captured in battle wished they'd died on the field, so great is the cruelty that awaits them.

skillTree.localised_description: Though aged and withered, he is deceptively tenacious, far beyond the limits of humanity.

effects.description: Hit points: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: Records of his first sightings date back little more than a century, telling of an aged nomad mystic with fire for eyes.

skillTree.localised_description: Even from within their vessels the Djinn will protect their masters.

skillTree.localised_description: The relentless drive and fury of the elemental spirits, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: It is said throughout Araby that there is little about the art of sorcery the Wizard Caliph does not know, and he specialises in the lifting and laying of curses.

effects.description: Djinn Essence: 5 per turn
Effect duration: +50% for Hex and Augment spells

skillTree.localised_description: Many Arabyan sorcerers hail from within the walls of the Wizard Caliph's Palace, and many more come seeking enlightenment.

effects.description: Hero capacity: +1 for Magicians

Hero recruit rank: +4 for Magicians
	(all provinces)

skillTree.localised_description: If one were to travel past the Eunuch Mountains and cross treacherous deserts in search of answers, one might find oneself a guest in the palace of a mysterious sorcerer whose existence is shrouded in myth and legend.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -50% when fighting in desert terrain

Melee attack: +8 when fighting in desert terrain

skillTree.localised_description: The Wizard Caliph's Palace is the greatest trove of magical knowledge in Araby and beyond. The price to access such treasures, of course, is never cheap.

skillTree.localised_description: Within living memory, the image of the Wizard Caliph has always been that of a withered old man. In truth, none remember his name, his age, or how he came to be.
